productionSqlExpression: SELECT COUNT(*) AS result FROM oe_hdr WHERE order_date >= DATEFROMPARTS(YEAR(DATEADD(month,-11,GETDATE())), MONTH(DATEADD(month,-11,GETDATE())), 1) AND order_date < DATEADD(month, 1, DATEFROMPARTS(YEAR(DATEADD(month,-11,GETDATE())), MONTH(DATEADD(month,-11,GETDATE())), 1)) AND ( LTRIM(RTRIM(COALESCE(web_shopper_id, N''))) <> N'' OR LTRIM(RTRIM(COALESCE(web_shopper_email,N''))) <> N'' OR LTRIM(RTRIM(COALESCE(web_reference_no, N''))) <> N'' );
calculationType: Count web orders for the appropriate calendar month.
